Dr. Gordon Wright

title: About
text:
LittleMonkeyLab is a research lab in the Department of Psychology, Goldsmiths, University of London.
The lab is part of the Personality and Social Processes Research Group and is a student-focussed research lab exploring real-life social interaction and aspects of personality
If you would like to know more by joining our email list, please follow the link below
Email List Sign-up form
or paste this link into your browser: http://eepurl.com/gBI-qz
